name: Devilish Deeds
description:
In this Game you play as the Devil, who is a little bit down on his luck and owes God rent by the end of the week to keep his buisness afloat! Assist the people who enter your Curses Shop by crafting up a curse they desire, be it for themselves or others. You will need to choose an appropriate item to curse and give it 2 unique curses Types If you sort out their situation Well you may even get a tip! But do poorly and you will be fined for damages. Each Character will hint as to what curse they want but its up to you to figure out what they mean.

Made for the GodotWildJam with the theme and wildcard of:



Credits:

Coding : Citona

Art : MonsieurLeFrog
